body:
On the shop, the code Avicore 2 questions
 1. If I Use It To Buy Emerald Than How Much Would It Be (50 -20%) (i suk at math)
2. Can You Use It More Than Once

title: With the gift code?

replies.body:
1. It would be $40
2. You can use it once each time you purchase I believe, but not more than once on the same product.
